text: Königsberg in Bayern is a town in Haßberge, in Lower Franconia, Bavaria, Germany. It is 7 km (5 miles) northeast of Haßfurt, and 31 km (20 miles) northwest of Bamberg. It was an exclave of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha until 1918, after having been a part of Saxe-Hildburghausen. == Photo gallery == Koenigsberg in Bayern-02-Marktplatz-2006-gje.jpg Koenigsberg in Bayern-11-Haeuser-2006-gje.jpg Koenigsberg in Bayern-24-Marienkirche-2006-gje.jpg Koenigsberg in Bayern- Marienkirche-02-2006-gje.jpg Koenigsberg in Bayern-Marienkirche-08-zum Chor-2018-gje.jpg Koenigsberg in Bayern-Marienkirche-58-zur Empore-2018-gje.jpg Koenigsberg in Bayern-Marienkirche-60-Orgel-2018-gje.jpg ==References== Category:Haßberge (district)
title: Königsberg, Bavaria
